Dataset.sql: select sum(CNT) as CNT from (select count(1) as CNT from Sys_Group_User where GroupID = #GroupID# union all select count(1) as CNT from Sys_Group_Module a, Sys_Module_Action b where a.GroupID = #GroupID# and a.ModuleID = b.ModuleID and a.ActionID = b.ActionID and b.IsDiv = '0' union all select count(1) as CNT from Sys_Group_User where GroupID = #GroupID#) a
